subject: Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Mine That Bird will have surgery for an entrapped epiglottis, but his trainer, Chip Woolley, said that the gelding remained on track to compete in the Travers Stakes on Aug. 29.
snippet: Mine That Bird will have surgery for an entrapped epiglottis, but his trainer, Chip Woolley, said that the gelding remained on track to compete in the Travers Stakes on Aug. 29.
